My name is Kevin Aktug. I am a 3D Environment Artist. I have 2 years of experience working in the gaming industry, which is backed by 6+ years of experience in digital freelance work. I graduated with honors from The Art Institute of Washington, where I attained my BFA in Game Art and Design.

I currently serve as the Customer Care Technology Specialist at Custom Ink. I'm always on the lookout for the next big thing. I specialize in many aspects of 3D design, with my current, primary duties being:

  • Hard Surface Modeling
  • Hi-poly to low-poly normal/spec map baking
  • Level & Environmental Design
  • UDK/UE3 Level & asset creation
  • Unwrapping & texturing
  • Material & Shader creation
  • Lighting

I'm also all over the web! Connect with me!
